archimate:Resource.name: Service Implementation Adapter
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB interfaces with the Operational Systems Layer and passes on the service call to the Operational Systems Layer in a form that is compliant with the Solutions Platform in the Operational Systems Layer, where the underlying Solution Components for the service are housed.

properties.value: This ABB interfaces with the Operational Systems Layer and passes on the service call to the Operational Systems Layer in a form that is compliant with the Solutions Platform in the Operational Systems Layer, where the underlying Solution Components for the service are housed.
